name: Lucius Aurelius

appearance.description: Lucius Aurelius carries himself with an air of authority, exuding confidence and power. He has a strong, imposing presence that commands respect.
appearance.hair: Short, dark brown with streaks of silver at the temples

background.family: Descended from a long line of esteemed military generals and senators, instilling in him a sense of duty and honor
background.motivation: To rise through the ranks of the Roman military and secure a legacy that will be remembered for centuries

skills: Proficient in combat with both sword and shield
secrets: Lucius harbors a deep-seated desire for power and recognition, willing to do whatever it takes to achieve his goals
He has clandestine connections within the political circles of Rome, using them to further his own ambitions

        "hair": "Short, dark brown",
        "eyes": "Intense, steely grey"
    },
    "background": {
        "hometown": "Rome",

}
